Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: For lease two suites available at Avon Wellness Center, a premier medical office building in Avon, CT. Since its initial construction and lease out, this is the first time space has been available at the building. Situated off Route 10/202, just one minute from Route 44, the property offers a convenient and peaceful suburban location within walking distance to local shops, restaurants, fitness center and daycare as well as the Rails-to-Trails recreational walking path. The building also offers prominent signage opportunities.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Premier Medical Office Space Available for Lease

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
OVERVIEWGREAT LOCATION, ONE-OF-A-KIND FACILITY

CBRE is pleased to offer Class A medical office space for lease at Avon Wellness Center/100 Simsbury Road in Avon, Connecticut. This one-of-kind, high-end, services-oriented facility offers amenities that raise the bar for leased space expectations. Built in 2000, this 65,000 SF facility is leased to a variety of medical providers including Hartford Hospital, Jefferson Radiology and Advanced Foot & Ankle. The first floor, 26,887 SF, HealthTrax space, can be used as-is or converted to medical space. Impeccably maintained, tenants and patients alike enjoy the clean, safe, convenient and inviting nature of this professional center. Situated off Route 10/202, just one minute from Route 44, the property offers a convenient and peaceful suburban location within walking distance to local shops, restaurants, fitness center, daycare as well as the Rails-to-Trails recreational walking path.

AVON WELLNESS CENTER MEDICAL/OFFICE SPACE

+1,000 SF up to 26,887 SF available+949 SF to 5,501 SF on the 2nd level and up to 26,887 SF on the 1st floor
+Bright spaces with lobby access in Avon Wellness Center
+Generous tenant improvement allowance from the landlord
+Main lobby entrance with direct access to parking
+Next to Riverdale Farms
+Great visibility and signage opportunities
+Possible separate entrances parking area for larger first floor tenant
+Minutes to Route 44 retail shops

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: Built-out with reception/waiting area, five exam rooms, one office, private bathroom and lab area
Signage available at both entrances to the property
Free parking at both entrances to the property
Outdoor patio with table and seating

Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: The property is located in proximity to Route 44 with access off West Avon Road and Dale Road.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 44,400 SF office building available for lease. It can be subdivided to 14,400 SF and 30,000 SF.
